product_title: Croma 4 in 1 Convertible 1 Ton 3 Star Inverter Split AC with Dust Filter (2024 Model, Copper Condenser, CRLA012IND283257)
overview_text:
Efficient Inverter Rotary Compressor with Inverter Technology
Enjoy superior cooling performance and energy efficiency with the high-efficiency inverter rotary compressor and advanced inverter technology of this air conditioner. These innovative features optimize compressor operation by adjusting cooling capacity in real-time, resulting in energy savings and reduced electricity costs.
 
Stabilizer-Free Operation
Experience stable operation even during voltage fluctuations without the need for an external stabilizer with this air conditioner's stabilizer-free operation. Engineered to withstand voltage variations, this AC ensures reliable performance and safeguards against power surges, enhancing durability and providing peace of mind.
 
100% Copper Condenser & Evaporator Coil with Blue Plated Anti-Corrosive Coating
Benefit from enhanced durability and efficient heat transfer with the 100% copper condenser and evaporator coil of the Croma air conditioner. The blue-plated anti-corrosive coating protects against rust and corrosion, ensuring long-lasting performance and optimal cooling efficiency, even in humid conditions.
 
PM 2.5 Filter with Activated Carbon and Dust Filter:
Enjoy cleaner and healthier indoor air with the advanced filtration system of the Croma air conditioner. Featuring a PM 2.5 filter with activated carbon and dust filter, these ACs effectively eliminate harmful airborne particles, pollutants, and allergens, providing fresh and purified indoor air quality.
 
Air Conditioner Modes
Experience personalized cooling comfort with a variety of modes tailored to your preferences and requirements. From Auto mode for automatic temperature adjustment to Turbo mode for rapid cooling, Sleep mode for enhanced sleep comfort, Dry mode for dehumidification, and ECO mode for energy savings, the Croma air conditioner offers versatility and convenience.
 
700 CMH High Air Flow Volume for Efficient Cooling
Stay cool even in extreme temperatures with the impressive cooling capacity and efficient airflow distribution of the Croma air conditioner. With a 3450Watts Cooling Capacity, 700 CMH airflow volume, and 2-way air swing, this AC ensures rapid and uniform cooling, making it suitable for any environment, even in temperatures as high as 52 degrees Celsius.
 
Humidity Control
Experience improved comfort and air quality with the built-in humidity control features of the Croma air conditioner. This AC helps maintain optimal humidity levels, reducing excess moisture in the air and creating a more comfortable and healthy indoor environment.
 
Leakage Detector and Temperature Sensor
Ensure safety and reliability with the built-in leakage detector and temperature sensor of the Croma air conditioner. These intelligent features detect potential leaks and monitor temperature fluctuations, allowing for early detection of issues and preventing damage to the AC unit, ensuring uninterrupted cooling performance.
 
Self-Diagnosis Capability for Errors
Experience simplified maintenance and troubleshooting with the self-diagnosis capability of the Croma air conditioner. This AC can automatically detect and identify errors or malfunctions, facilitating quick and accurate diagnosis, minimizing downtime, and ensuring efficient operation.
